member.name: M:_VL_Lang_.VL.ISolution._Operations_.SetPinValue_OrFurtherOutwards(VL.Lang.PublicAPI.ISolution,System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableStack{System.UInt32},System.String,System.Object,VL.Lang.PublicAPI.ISolution@)
member.summary: Sets the pin if not connected. If connected to a pin of the surrounding node definition: goes to caller site and sets the pin there.

member.name: M:_VL_Lang_.VL.ISolution._Operations_.SetPinValue(VL.Lang.PublicAPI.ISolution,System.UInt32,System.String,System.Object,VL.Lang.PublicAPI.ISolution@)
member.summary: Sets the value of the given pin.
member.param: Sets the value of the given pin.
The unique id of the node application.
The name of the input pin on which the value should get set.
The value to set.
A new solution with the value stored in the pin of the given node.

member.name: M:_VL_Lang_.VL.ISolution._Operations_.ModifyPinGroup(VL.Lang.PublicAPI.ISolution,System.UInt32,System.String,System.Boolean,VL.Lang.PublicAPI.PinGroupBuilder@)
member.summary: Returns a VL.Lang.PublicAPI.PinGroupBuilder which can be used to modify the given pin group. The builder expects all current pins to get added and once finished will synchronize the internal pin group.
member.param: Returns a VL.Lang.PublicAPI.PinGroupBuilder which can be used to modify the given pin group. The builder expects all current pins to get added and once finished will synchronize the internal pin group.
The unique id of the node application.
The name of the pin group the returned builder should modify.
Whether or not the group is an input our output group.
A VL.Lang.PublicAPI.PinGroupBuilder to modify the given pin group.

Whether or not the group is an input our output group.
